---
title: "story_memo"
knit: (function(input_file, encoding) {
    out_dir <- 'docs';
    rmarkdown::render(input_file,
      encoding=encoding,
      output_file=file.path(dirname(input_file), out_dir, 'index.html'))})
author: "Shradha Dinesh"
date: "2024-06-03"
output: html_document
---

1. Your Name, Contact Information, Date 
2. In two sentences, what is this story about?
3. In one sentence, why tell this story NOW?
4. Who is your target audience?
5. Three people you can interview for this story
6. Potential impact
7. What are three things that surprised or interested you about this story?
8. Context: Summarize any previous coverage.
9. Photos, video, graphics - How will you make this story visual?
10. What other information do you need to gather? 
11. Estimated delivery
